item.title:
RT by @A_BoxOfRain: A SWAT team detonated explosives in this innocent woman's home. Cops smashed every window & careened through her front door in an armored vehicle.
The government then refused to pay her.
I'd like to tell you why Vicki Baker's story matters. My latest: https://reason.com/2022/06/29/this-innocent-womans-house-was-destroyed-by-a-swat-team-a-jury-says-shes-owed-60000
item.dc:creator: @billybinion
item.description:
A SWAT team detonated explosives in this innocent woman's home. Cops smashed every window & careened through her front door in an armored vehicle.

The government then refused to pay her.

I'd like to tell you why Vicki Baker's story matters. My latest: reason.com/2022/06/29/this-i…

item.title: RT by @A_BoxOfRain: We found that the overall upfront cost to replace all energy in the 145 countries, which emit 99.7 percent of world CO2, is about $62 trillion. However, due to the $11 trillion annual energy cost savings, the payback time for the new system is less than six years.
item.dc:creator: @mzjacobson
item.description:
We found that the overall upfront cost to replace all energy in the 145 countries, which emit 99.7 percent of world CO2, is about $62 trillion. However, due to the $11 trillion annual energy cost savings, the payback time for the new system is less than six years.

item.title: RT by @A_BoxOfRain: The Court of Appeal's ruled that organisations or people can't sue water companies for sewer overflows. It restated only regulators can prosecute. "If United Utilities did not build the outfalls & cannot remove them...then that does seem to me to be an involuntary invasion".
item.dc:creator: @LDNWaterkeeper
item.description:
The Court of Appeal's ruled that organisations or people can't sue water companies for sewer overflows.
It restated only regulators can prosecute.
"If United Utilities did not build the outfalls & cannot remove them...then that does seem to me to be an involuntary invasion".

nitter.42l.fr/GoodLawProject/status/1541369202686181376#m

item.title: RT by @A_BoxOfRain: Our school Gas/electric is forecast as a 300% increase. The actual figures look more like 400%. Why is this not being reported? Of the school budgets I have seen I am unable to see how schools will cope. The money involved is eye watering
item.dc:creator: @Newheadteacher
item.description: Our school Gas/electric is forecast as a 300% increase. The actual figures look more like 400%. Why is this not being reported? Of the school budgets I have seen I am unable to see how schools will cope. The money involved is eye watering

item.title:
R to @jonmbutterworth: I’d say that all good things must come to an end, but I’d like to h the hunk that isn’t entirely true.
Anyway, my thoughts are with you at this difficult time.

item.description:
I’d say that all good things must come to an end, but I’d like to h the hunk that isn’t entirely true.

Anyway, my thoughts are with you at this difficult time.

item.title:
RT by @A_BoxOfRain: Regulators that are unwilling or even incapable of acting coupled with political oversight that is so light touch it has left nothing but a void and all mixed up with a mountain of unrestricted corporate greed.
And we wonder why our rivers are full of sh*t.
item.dc:creator: @Feargal_Sharkey
item.description:
Regulators that are unwilling or even incapable of acting coupled with political oversight that is so light touch it has left nothing but a void and all mixed up with a mountain of unrestricted corporate greed.

And we wonder why our rivers are full of sh*t.

item.title: RT by @A_BoxOfRain: Just heard the CE of @Ofwat on @BBCr4today not saying anything . Asked why sewage leaks had been allowed to continue - he didn’t answer . Asked when they would stop - he didn’t answer . No accountability . A mute regulator that hasn’t regulated . @Feargal_Sharkey @GreenJennyJones
item.dc:creator: @ChrisGPackham
item.description: Just heard the CE of @Ofwat on @BBCr4today not saying anything . Asked why sewage leaks had been allowed to continue - he didn’t answer . Asked when they would stop - he didn’t answer . No accountability . A mute regulator that hasn’t regulated . @Feargal_Sharkey @GreenJennyJones
